text: Department of Trade and Industry may refer to: ==Current== *Trade and Industry Department (Hong Kong) * Department of Trade and Industry (Isle of Man) * Department of Trade and Industry (Philippines) * Department of Trade and Industry (South Africa) ==Former== * Department of Trade and Industry (Australia), an Australian Government Department that existed between 1963 and 1972. * Trade and Industry Branch (Hong Kong), became the Commerce and Industry Bureau in 2000. * Department of Trade and Industry (United Kingdom), a U.K. department that existed between 1970 and 2007.
title: Department of Trade and Industry
